heroMsg: Online network for the dance and drum community. Join the fam, book a jam, use your online cam.

topcards.msg1: The goal is to have one place people in the dance and drum community can go to for scheduling taking and teaching classes.
topcards.msg2: Whether you're a drummer, dancer, both or just enthusiastic about either, we welcome you to become a member of the fam.
topcards.msg3: We want to help you communicate, co-ordinate, and make friends with people who love this stuff like you do.
